meanings.definition: A thick sauce in which pieces of food are dunked
meanings.sent1: I love to eat chips with a delicious cheese dip.
meanings.sent2: The party platter included a variety of dips for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The dip was so tasty, it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The spicy dip added a kick to the bland chips.
meanings.sent5: The creamy dip was the perfect accompaniment to the crunchy vegetables.

meanings.definition: A decrease in a particular quantity or value
meanings.sent1: There was a dip in the temperature as the evening approached.
meanings.sent2: The stock market experienced a dip in prices this week.
meanings.sent3: The sudden dip in sales surprised the store owner.
meanings.sent4: The dip in attendance at the event was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The dip in the road caused the car to bump along the uneven surface.
